full_text: Bier paar ee Blick 2017/KER/49767 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA FRIDAY, THE 8TH DAY OF DECEMBER 2017/17TH AGRAHAYANA, 1939 Cri.MC.No. 6990 of 2017 () CC.NO. 3541/2015 of JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT, CHENGANNUR. CRIME NO. 978/2011 OF CHENGANNOOR POLICE STATION , ALAPPUZHA. PETITIONER(S)/1ST ACCUSED: ROY VARGHESE, AGED 56 YEARS, S/O.K.M.VARGHESE, RESIDING AT KOLADATHETHU HOUSE, ALA VADAKUMURRIYIL, ALA VILLAGE, CHENGANNUR, ALAPPUZHA DISTRICT. BY ADVS.SRI.G.HARIHARAN SRI.PRAVEEN.H. RESPONDENT(S)/STATE AND COMPLAINANT: 1. STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM-682031. 2. SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, CHENGANNUR POLICE STATION, CHENGANNUR, ALAPPUZHA DISTRICT-689121. 3. ARUN THOMAS, $/0.K.K.THOMAS, KANNATTUMALAYIL HOUSE, PERISSERI, PULIYOOR VILLAGE, CHENGANNUR, ALAPPUZHA DISTRICT-689121. Ri & R2 BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT.K.K.SHEEBA R3 BY ADVS. SRI.O.D.SIVADAS SRI.JOSEPH GEORGE (ALA) THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 08-12-2017, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: TS Bier paar ee Blick 2017/KER/49767 Crl.MC.No. 6990 of 2017 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' ANNEXURES ANNEXURE!I TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT FILED BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT IN CONNECTION WITH CRIME NO.978/2011 OF CHENGANNUR POLICE STATION AS C.C.NO.526/2012 AND LATER RENUMBERED AS C.C.NO.3541/2015. ANNEXURE II TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN TO BY THE 3RD RESPONDENT. RESPONDENT(S)" ANNEXURES - NIL ITRUE COPY! PS TO JUDGE TS pet ape 2017/KER/49767 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 8" day of December, 2017 ORDER Petitioner is the 1% accused in C.C.No.3541/2015 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Chengannur which has arisen from Crime No.978/2011 of the Chengannur Police Station, registered for the offences punishable under Sections 477A, 408 and 381 read with Section 34 of the Indian Penal Code. 2. It seems that the matter has been amicably settled between the parties. 3. On going through the facts and circumstances of the case, it seems that the matter can be permitted to be settled. It has been reported that no criminal antecedents have been reported against the petitioner. The 3 respondent has filed Annexure-II affidavit affirming that the matter has been amicably settled between him and the petitioner and he has no complaints against the petitioner. Considering the fact that the matter has already been settled amicably between the parties, this court is satisfied that no purpose would be served in proceeding with the trial of the case. Bee pet Blick 2017/KER/49767 Crl.M.C. No.6990 of 2017 2: Matters being SO, all further proceedings in C.C.No.3541/2015 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Chengannur which has arisen from Crime No.978/2011 of the Chengannur Police Station against the petitioner, are liable to be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and all further proceedings in C.C.No.3541/2015 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Chengannur which has arisen from Crime No.978/2011 of the Chengannur Police Station against the petitioner, are hereby quashed. Sd/- B. KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE. sd // True Copy // P.A. to Judge
